title: Welcome to Dartford Holi Festival!
message: Gates are now open! Collect your free colour powder at the entrance. Have an amazing time!

title: First Colour Throw in 5 minutes!
message: Head to the open area for the first big colour throw at 11:30. Get your powder ready!

title: Stay Hydrated!
message: It's warming up! Free water stations are available near the entrance, food court, and both sides of the arena.
